description: Represents an async transcription run. Poll this resource until status is COMPLETED or FAILED.

uid.description: Unique identifier of the transcription run

created_at.description: When the run was created, in ISO 8601 format

updated_at.description: When the run was last updated, in ISO 8601 format

result.description: The transcription result (only present when status is COMPLETED)

error_message.description: Error message (only present when status is FAILED)
